Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Nicholas Brady was the most recent Republican to serve New Jersey in the Senate prior to Chiesa's appointment, not Clifford Case.
Understate: The claim understates the fact that there was a more recent Republican senator, Nicholas Brady, who served in the Senate before Chiesa's appointment.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on the opinion of former Gov. Christine Todd Whitman, without providing any additional evidence or data.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Clifford Case was the last Republican senator from New Jersey, without considering the appointment of Nicholas Brady.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores the alternative explanation that Nicholas Brady, not Clifford Case, was the most recent Republican senator from New Jersey before Chiesa's appointment.
